text: The Oracle Challenger Series – New Haven is a professional tennis tournament played on hard courts. It is currently part of the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) Challenger Tour and the Women's Tennis Association (WTA) 125K series. It is held annually in New Haven, Connecticut, United States since 2019. ==Past finals== ===Men's Singles=== {|class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2020 || colspan="3" align="center" |- | 2019 || Tommy Paul || Marcos Giron || 6–3, 6–3 |} ===Women's Singles=== {|class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2020 || colspan="3" align="center" |- | 2019 || Anna Blinkova || Usue Maitane Arconada || 6–4, 6–2 |} ===Men's Doubles=== {|class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2020 || colspan="3" align="center" |- | 2019 || Robert Galloway Nathaniel Lammons || Sander Gillé Joran Vliegen || 7–5, 6–4 |} ===Women's Doubles=== {|class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2020 || colspan="3" align="center" |- | 2019 || Anna Blinkova Oksana Kalashnikova || Usue Maitane Arconada Jamie Loeb || 6–2, 4–6, [10–4] |} ==References== ==External links== * Official Website Category:ATP Challenger Tour Category:WTA 125K series Category:Hard court tennis tournaments in the United States Category:Tennis in Connecticut Category:2019 establishments in Connecticut Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2019 Category:Sports in New Haven, Connecticut
title: Oracle Challenger Series – New Haven
